name: INRequestPaymentIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for delivering a request for payment from another user of your app.

items.name: func resolvePayer(for: INRequestPaymentIntent, with: (INRequestPaymentPayerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the person to receive the payment request.

items.name: func resolveCurrencyAmount(for: INRequestPaymentIntent, with: (INRequestPaymentCurrencyAmountResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the amount of money requested.

items.name: func resolveNote(for: INRequestPaymentIntent, with: (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the notes associated with the request.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INRequestPaymentIntent, completion: (INRequestPaymentIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the payment request and confirm the details.

items.name: func handle(intent: INRequestPaymentIntent, completion: (INRequestPaymentIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles sending the payment request to the designated user.
